mapper.sql: SELECT t.`id` id, t.`parnet_id` parnetId, t.`seq_no` seqNo, t.`order_no` orderNo, t.`from_cust_no` fromCustNo, t.`from_cust_type` fromCustType, t.`from_acc_no` fromAccNo, t.`from_acc_id` fromAccId, t.`from_cust_mobile` fromCustMobile, t.`from_cust_name` fromCustName, t.`to_cust_no` toCustNo, t.`to_cust_type` toCustType, t.`to_acc_no` toAccNo, t.`to_acc_id` toAccId, t.`to_cust_mobile` toCustMobile, t.`to_cust_name` toCustName, t.`amt` amt, t.`bid_id` bidId, t.`tender_id` tenderId, t.`new_tender_id` newTenderId, t.`loan_contract_no` loanContractNo, t.`lend_contract_no` lendContractNo, t.`product_name` productName, t.`trade_type_parent` tradeTypeParent, t.`trade_type` tradeType, t.`action_type` actionType, t.`fund_type` fundType, t.`process_state` processState, t.`status` status, t.`settle_type` settleType, t.`serial_number` serialNumber, t.`memo` memo, t.`sync` sync, t.`callback` callback, t.`create_time` createTime, t.`modify_time` modifyTime, t.`resp_code` respCode, t.`resp_msg` respMsg FROM t_gq_fss_trade_process t
mapper.select: where t.action_type = 1104 AND t.parnet_id=0 AND t.process_state = '10170002' AND t.status = '10030001' AND t.trade_type IN (11040002,11040003,11040004,11040005,11040015)

where t.action_type = 1104 AND t.parnet_id = 0 AND t.process_state = '10050031' AND t.status = '10030003' AND t.trade_type IN (11040002,11040003,11040004,11040005,11040015) AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, t.modify_time,now()) >10
